title: I HAVE PROOF!
body:
ALWAYS whenever something stupid happens with unit collision or pathing, i never manage to screenshot or anything in time.

but at least i got this, Look at the minimap, there is clearly a pathing line to where i clicked, near darius, and syndra just walks up to the inhib and keeps walking right into it.....

and just keeeeeeeeeeeeeps walking into it....

if i hadn't clicked off and moved her manually, I'm id probably still be there now.

like wtf is this? i have also had quite often [Like almost every game] That the champion is walking through the jungle to where i clicked on the map, and the champion turns the corner to go one way, then after going that way for a second turns round and goes the other way.... like wtf is that? O_O
also i get slowed by going through the base gates (happened in this syndra game too actually) 

i know that unit-collision and pathing are fucked atm, but this is just BAD!
i seriously don't know how this isn't a high priority for riot??

replies.body: Yet another reason why Illaoi is evil

I was playing rek'sai and was attempting to escape from the enemy senjuani into the safety of my tunnel in the midlane river when i got blocked by her and a wall when trying to run past... I literally could not move anywhere
but we all knew the pathing was broken, at least its a bit better now
illaoi is like fuck u m8 XD
